solution_line_template: That means he has {initial_gold_bars}-{gold_lost_to_taxes}=<<{initial_gold_bars}-{gold_lost_to_taxes}={gold_after_taxes}>>{gold_after_taxes} bars after taxes
So he has {gold_after_taxes}/{divorce_divisor}=<<{gold_after_taxes}/{divorce_divisor}={gold_after_divorce}>>{gold_after_divorce} bars after the divorce
